title: Learning Transfer Design for Enhancing Practical Competencies in Social Studies via E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tools, foundational comprehension of social science theories
context.additional_context: Combining theory and practice in e-learning environments for current practitioners to perform projects that enhance workplace applicability

learning_goals: Learners can accomplish a social issue analysis project using collaborative tools on an e-learning platform.
Learners develop an action plan to directly apply acquired knowledge to at least one fieldwork case.

Based on diagnostic test results for thinking styles (liberal/conservative), learners can select two out of four provided e-learning strategies suited to their type and achieve an "excellent" rating in at least two out of three learning effectiveness evaluation checklist items (engagement, comprehension, satisfaction).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
